Articles.Content:
Hi there

Are there any known issues with having, say, KSP 1.0.4 and 1.0.5 installed on the same machine?

I recently installed, ran and then uninstalled 1.0.5. I had endless problems with 1.0.4 after that, sorted out (I hope!) only by deleting KSP, deleting saved application states and then restarting my whole machine. So I suspect there may be problems...

There should not be any problems if you copy the other version of KSP to a new folder.

The Player.logs will be written to the same place, and you will see one version try start in the others screen resolution if they are different.

But please close KSP properly so there is no saved application state, as this feature of OS X will cause problems.

OK thanks. Will try.

In my experience, saved application states still exist even when KSP has been shut down. Edited November 20, 2015 by Clear Air Turbulence
Yeah but at least it saves it as shut down, not part way through a game.
